creator: hrolland@legisway.com
text:
Cookie sended by IIS web server are shared between all threads.

If I use JMeter 2.2 with the same script it's work fine, but with the version 2.3.1 all thread share cookies.

I use a "HTTP Cookie Manager" with a policy "compatibility", I make test with all policy it's the same problem

Are you setting "Clear each iteration"?

If so, this is a known bug:

http://wiki.apache.org/jakarta-jmeter/CookieManagerBugIn231
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
"Clear each iteration" was selected.
Thank you
I mark the bug as duplicate of 44042

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44042 ***
creator: hrolland@legisway.com
